name: Bangla Font Solution for WordPress
author: ThemeBing

sections.description: This is Bangla Font solution plugin for all wordpress site. huge amount of bangladeshi peoplevare facing Bangla Font issue on their website. and not found easy solution at all on the internet. and they are faced lot of hassle everyday. now we bring the best and easest solution for Bangla Font. no more hassle ! just install the plugin and enjoy!
sections.installation:
1. Unpack the entire contents of this plugin zip file into your wp-content/plugins/ folder locally
  2. Upload to your site
  3. Navigate to wp-admin/plugins.php on your site (your WP Admin plugin page)
  4. Activate this plugin

OR you can just install it with WordPress by going to Plugins > Add New > and type this plugin’s name
sections.faq:
Can i install this plugin any wordpres site ?

Yes this plugin are compatible with any wordpress site
